column1: @entity3 the fly was hungry.  She went to the store.  She saw her friend @entity1 the cat at the store.  @entity1 waved to @entity3.  @entity3 waved back.  At the store, @entity3 bought ice cream, fruit, and pasta.  Then she went home.  She looked in her fridge.  In her fridge she saw meatballs, rice, tomato sauce, and garlic.  She chose to make a pasta dinner and invite all of her friends over.  She invited @entity1 the cat and @entity4 the dog.  She also invited Freddy the frog and @entity0 the alligator.  @entity2 arrived to a beautiful meal made by @entity3.  They all ate happily.  After dinner, @entity3 brought out dessert.  She brought out pie, fruit, cupcakes, and ice cream.  Everybody ate a cupcake.  @entity4 ate ice cream too.  @entity0 had some pie and fruit as well as the cupcake.  @entity1 had some pie too.  @entity3 told everyone to come back for dinner again.  They all said goodbye and left.  @entity3 was happy and full.  She went to bed smiling to herself.
ice cream, tomato sauce, and garlic.
